Soul & Shade.description: Complete the Pantheon of the Knight

Pure Completion.description: Achieve 112% game completion and finish the game.

Inspiration.description: Complete the Pantheon of the Painter

Focus.description: Complete the Pantheon of the Sage

Embrace the Void.description: Ascend the Pantheon of Hallownest and take your place at its peak

Brotherhood.description: Complete the Pantheon of the Master

Ritual.description: Defeat the Nightmare King and complete the Ritual

Banishment.description: Banish the Grimm Troupe from Hallownest

Steel Soul.description: Finish the game in Steel Soul mode

Steel Heart.description: Achieve 100% game completion and finish the game in Steel Soul mode

Speedrun 2.description: Complete the game in under 5 hours

Speedrun 1.description: Complete the game in under 10 hours

Speed Completion.description: Achieve 100% game completion and finish the game in under 20 hours

Completion.description: Achieve 100% game completion and finish the game

Ascension.description: Collect 2400 Essence and hear the Seer's final words

The Hollow Knight.description: Defeat the Hollow Knight and become the Vessel

Happy Couple.description: Allow the Nailsmith to find a new calling

Sealed Siblings.description: Defeat the Hollow Knight with Hornet by your side

Passing of the Age.description: Aid the Herald in moving on

Dream No More.description: Defeat the Radiance and consume the light

Keen Hunter.description: Record all of Hallownest's creatures in the Hunter's Journal

Witness.description: Spend a final moment with Quirrel

Warrior.description: Complete the Trial of the Warrior

Solace.description: Bring peace to the Grey Mourner

Fool.description: Complete the Trial of the Fool

Conqueror.description: Complete the Trial of the Conqueror

Purity.description: Slay the Nailsmith with the Pure Nail

Awakening.description: Collect 1800 Essence and awaken the Dream Nail

Cartographer.description: Acquire a map of each area

Void.description: Remember the past and unite the Abyss

Metamorphosis.description: Rescue all of the imprisoned grubs

Hope.description: Open all of Hallownest's Stag Stations and discover the Stag Nest

Rivalry.description: Defeat Zote in the Colosseum of Fools

Grubfriend.description: Rescue half of the imprisoned grubs

Blessed.description: Acquire all Charms and receive Salubra's blessing

Connection.description: Open half of Hallownest's Stag Stations
